translation.en: Everything happens for a reason.
Think about that for a moment.
All your efforts...
personal, professional, carnal...
utter and absolute slaves...
translation.fr: ne sont que les esclaves serviles

translation.en: to some cosmically predetermined set of outcomes.
translation.fr: d'un résultat prédéterminé par le cosmos.

translation.en: As if we have no say in, let alone culpability for,
translation.fr:
Comme si on n'avait aucune prise,
et a fortiori aucune responsabilité,

translation.en: the defining moments in our lives.
translation.fr: sur les moments clés de notre vie.

translation.en: If you want a life of purpose...
translation.fr: Si vous voulez trouver un but à votre vie,

translation.en: by inverting the notion...
that everything happens for a reason.
Redefine it.
Not as some future explanation
for terrible tragedy,
or glorious achievement,
but as validation...
of the deliberate choices that lead us to these critical junctures in the first place.
translation.fr:
des choix délibérés qui vous ont mené
à ces moments charnières.

translation.en: Assert authority over chance, fate,
translation.fr: Rendez-vous maître du hasard, du futur

translation.en: and destiny, because everything does happen for a reason.
translation.fr:
et du destin, car il est vrai
que rien n'arrive sans raison.

translation.en: And that reason is you.
To attain elite success,
you must be willing to make the hard choices,
translation.fr:
vous devez être prêt
à faire des choix difficiles,

translation.en: do the unpleasant things,
risk your most valuable assets,
and do away with the shackles designed by society to limit us:
translation.fr:
et à vous débarrasser
des chaînes imposées par la société pour vous limiter :

translation.en: love, marriage, children.
And above all,
the uninvited imposition
of lesser people's moral agendas.
translation.fr: de ceux qui vous sont inférieurs.

translation.en: Because nothing worthwhile
translation.fr: Car rien qui n'en vaille la peine

translation.en: is ever achieved without sacrifice.
And true greatness...
only comes to those...
willing to pursue it...
at...
any cost.
[man on laptop] Ladies, gentlemen, Mr. and Mrs. Sean Donovan!
translation.fr:
Mesdames et messieurs,
M. et Mme Sean Donovan !

translation.en: Ah, let's see it. Come on, kiss her!
[guard] Hold on there, miss!
May I help you?
Oh, hello again, Mrs. Donovan.
Hi.
Sorry.
I have some legal paperwork for Miss Montgomery.
translation.fr:
J'ai des papiers juridiques
pour Mme Montgomery.

translation.en: I'm just gonna run up for a quick signature.
translation.fr: Il me faut juste sa signature.

translation.en: Uh, I still need to call you up.
It's really coming down out there, huh?
Hey! Wait! Wait!
This is Lisa Donovan, and I need to speak with my husband right now.
translation.fr:
Ici Lisa Donovan,
je dois parler à mon mari, tout de suite.

translation.en: Hello? Can anybody hear me?
-[elevator bell dings] -Fuck.
Sean!
Call it off!
[woman on radio] Forecast for the Bay Area today will be cool and breezy
translation.fr:
TROIS JOURS PLUS TÔT Le temps sera venteux aujourd'hui
à San Francisco...

translation.en: [man chuckles] All right, all right.
Castro, I get it. I get it. I get it.
We'll go on a walk.
Just let me get my pants on, and we'll get out there in two minutes.
translation.fr:
Je m'habille, et on sort,
laisse-moi deux minutes.

translation.en: All right. I see you. I see you.
We're going outside right now. Give me a second.
Will you be here when we get back for a proper good morning?
translation.fr:
Tu seras là à notre retour,
pour un vrai câlin ?

translation.en: I wish.
I have to stop by the lab before my first pitch.
translation.fr:
Je dois passer au labo
avant ma première présentation.

translation.en: I needed to make sure that my presentation transferred.
translation.fr: Voir si mes documents ont été transférés.

translation.en: I know the feeling.
First pitch is always the scariest. Just gotta stay in the moment.
translation.fr:
La première fois, c'est la plus dure.
Il faut rester concentré.

translation.en: Try not to think of all the things you can't control, focus on what you can.
translation.fr:
Ne pas penser
à ce qui échappe à ton contrôle.

translation.en: What if I freeze?
First Triple-A game I played...
translation.fr: Pour mon premier match en AAA,

translation.en: Giants sent their scouts down.
translation.fr: les recruteurs des Giants étaient là.

translation.en: On my first windup, my cleat broke off my shoe
translation.fr:
Je me suis pété un crampon
au premier lancer, la balle est partie

translation.en: and the ball sailed about five feet over the catcher.
translation.fr:
Je me suis pété un crampon
au premier lancer, la balle est partie presque deux mètres au-dessus du batteur.

translation.en: I knew if I didn't pull it together right then,
translation.fr: Je savais que je devais me ressaisir,

translation.en: I'd never get another shot.
So...
I picked up the cleat,
and put in my pocket as a symbol of all the obstacles,
translation.fr:
et je l'ai mis dans ma poche
pour symboliser tous les obstacles,

translation.en: real and imagined, bouncing around inside my head.
translation.fr: réels et inventés, qui envahissaient mon cerveau.

translation.en: Figured if I could condense all that noise into something smaller
translation.fr:
Je me suis dit
qu'en condensant tout ce bruit,

translation.en: to fit in a pocket...
translation.fr: en le mettant dans ma poche...

translation.en: then all my self-doubt could be managed.
Threw my first no-hitter that day.
translation.fr: Ce jour-là, j'ai fait un match parfait.

translation.en: You're gonna crush it.
Thank you.
-Come on, Castro. -[Castro barks]
Good morning. My name is Lisa Ruiz-Donovan,
and I am seeking an equity partner for my medical solutions company,
translation.fr:
et je cherche un investisseur
pour ma société de recherche médicale,

translation.en: Emigen Molecular Sequencing. Emigen Molecular Sequencing. Emigen Molecular Sequencing.
-Hmm. -Good job, young lady.
Thanks for coming in.
This isn't an area we're interested in exploring.
Let us talk and get back to you.
translation.fr: On en parle et on vous recontacte.

translation.en: Everybody's hard at work, I see.
Anymore billion-dollar breakthroughs?
-Just the one. -Minus the billion.
Any calls, Sophie?
Landlord.
-Want me to get him? -I'll call from my desk.
translation.fr:
- Je le rappelle ?
- Je m'en charge.

translation.en: -Did you eat? -Yep.
Both feet.
Scratched three VCs off the list.
Before I make this call, please tell me there's enough in our account to cover rent.
translation.fr:
Avant que j'appelle,
dis-moi qu'on assez pour payer le loyer.

translation.en: Yeah, for two months.
But payroll is another story.
I know you don't want to hear this, but I think it's time we consider approaching the drug companies.
translation.fr:
Même si ça te dérange, on va devoir
démarcher les firmes pharmaceutiques.

translation.en: No way. They would just buy us to kill us.
translation.fr: Non. Elles nous tueront dans l'œuf.

translation.en: True, but at least you would get your money back.
translation.fr: Au moins, tu récupérerais ton argent.

translation.en: You haven't taken a salary since we started this thing.
translation.fr: Tu es obligée de te priver de salaire.

translation.en: And you could be making five times what I'm paying you anyplace else.
translation.fr:
Et tu gagnerais cinq fois plus
si tu travaillais ailleurs.

translation.en: -Ten. -See?
You're in for the cause, same as I am.
translation.fr: Tu fais ça par conviction, comme moi.

translation.en: I would deny that in court, bankruptcy or otherwise.
translation.fr:
Je démentirai ça au tribunal,
si on fait faillite.

translation.en: Fine, I will continue to help you on your hunt for the golden ticket.
translation.fr:
D'accord, je continue à t'aider
à trouver le ticket d'or.

translation.en: As long as you promise to rework your pitch.
translation.fr:
Mais promets-moi
de revoir ta présentation.

translation.en: What's wrong with my pitch? We fact-checked it a hundred times.
translation.fr:
Où est le problème ?
On l'a révisée cent fois.

translation.en: Facts are not your problem.
It's emotional engagement.
I know this is outside of your comfort zone.
translation.fr: Je sais que ça te gêne.

translation.en: But you already have your way in.
translation.fr: Mais tu as une porte d'entrée.

translation.en: You just have to use it.
[woman] Catch us up, guys.
Trevor McIntire, seven years old, pulled a frying pan of hot grease onto his head.
translation.fr:
Trevor McIntire, sept ans,
huile chaude sur le visage.

translation.en: -Guardian? -Welfare mom. Still trying to locate her.
translation.fr:
- Ses parents ?
- Mère indigente. On la cherche.

translation.en: Looks like old scarring under the new injury.
translation.fr: On dirait des cicatrices sous la blessure.

translation.en: Let's get him up to Burn One for a head-to-toe.
You've got a nice strong arm there, Trev.
translation.fr: T'as de la force dans le bras.

translation.en: You like baseball?
I'm gonna go up with him.
Hang in there, little man. All right?
Giants sure could use a guy like you in the bullpen.
translation.fr: Les Giants seraient ravis de te recruter.

translation.en: [Sean] Hey, Todd.
-I'll catch you back at the van. -Yeah.
Ooh, hey, Doc, can I get some attention over here? It hurts when I do this.
translation.fr:
Doc, vous pouvez m'ausculter ?
Quand je fais ça, j'ai mal.

translation.en: Oh. [chuckles] Maybe you should stop doing that.
translation.fr: Eh bien, ne le fais pas.

translation.en: I don't know, I can't seem to help myself.
It's automatic when I get around a certain someone.
translation.fr: C'est automatique, quand je te vois.

translation.en: Todd, please. Can't you see this isn't the time or the place?
translation.fr:
Tyler, tu vois pas
que c'est pas le moment ?

translation.en: Hmm. Well, what I could see is you looking a little tense,
translation.fr: Ce que je vois, c'est que tu es stressée,

translation.en: so I thought I'd try to put a smile on your face.
translation.fr: je voulais juste te rendre le sourire.

translation.en: [Todd] What's wrong?
We just lost a patient on the table.
translation.fr: On vient de perdre un patient au bloc.

translation.en: Oh, babe, I'm sorry.
On top of that, we're short-staffed again.
translation.fr: En plus, on manque encore de personnel.

translation.en: And since I'm the low resident on the totem pole, I'm forced to pick up the slack.
translation.fr:
Et comme je suis la dernière recrue,
je me coltine tout le boulot.

translation.en: Well, as long as I've known you,
translation.fr:
Je n'ai jamais vu quelqu'un
te forcer à faire quelque chose

translation.en: no one's ever forced you to do something you don't wanna do, Ange.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai jamais vu quelqu'un
te forcer à faire quelque chose que tu voulais pas faire.

translation.en: You can always say no.
You're right.
I need to have that conversation.
My girl. See you at home.
translation.fr: Je suis fier de toi. À ce soir.

translation.en: You sure I can go?
-Stop. -You sure I'm good?
[man] Name your crime, Todd.
I don't know.
I'd kill Hitler. I'd for sure kill Hitler.
That's not a confession, that's more a moral imperative.
translation.fr:
C'est pas une confession,
c'est une obligation morale.

translation.en: Angela, show your man how it's done.
Yeah, no, there are too many guy questions in this bowl.
translation.fr:
Non, il y a trop de questions
pour les mecs.

translation.en: I'm so sorry, everyone.
This party is no longer accepting apologies, only confessions.
translation.fr:
On n'accepte plus les excuses,
juste les confessions.

translation.en: -You're up. -Oh.
I thought maybe you'd retire this game along with my brother's 20s.
translation.fr:
J'espérais qu'on enterre ce jeu
avec la vingtaine de mon frère.

translation.en: Forever young, baby, forever young.
Uh... "Would you ever have sex with someone
while you're in a relationship with someone else?"
translation.fr:
tout en étant en couple
avec quelqu'un d'autre ?"

translation.en: -Oh. -I'm guessing this is yours, Lionel.
translation.fr:
tout en étant en couple
avec quelqu'un d'autre ?" - C'est de toi, Lionel ?
- Comme toutes les meilleures.

translation.en: All the good ones are.
translation.fr:
- C'est de toi, Lionel ?
- Comme toutes les meilleures.

translation.en: Hold on. We talking, like, swinging, hall pass,
translation.fr: On parle d'échangisme, de relation libre,

translation.en: or whatever's trendy with the gay boys these days?
Ooh! I'm talking complete and total transparency.
Sex can be in the same room with multiple people.
translation.fr:
Ça peut être dans la même pièce,
avec plusieurs personnes.

translation.en: Sorry to disappoint, but I already got all the man I can handle.
translation.fr:
Désolée de vous décevoir,
mais mon homme me satisfait amplement.

translation.en: [kiss] He's enough for me.
What? Look, look.
If it's all above board then I'm definitely, definitely
translation.fr: Si c'était autorisé, je suis carrément partant

translation.en: order me up a hot meat sandwich with two slices
translation.fr:
je suis carrément partant pour un petit sandwich
entre J-Lo et ma chère et tendre Angela.

translation.en: of J-Lo and my sweet lady Angela.
translation.fr:
pour un petit sandwich
entre J-Lo et ma chère et tendre Angela.

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, baby, nobody asked you.
translation.fr: Mon chéri, on ne t'a rien demandé.

translation.en: Um, will you excuse me while I try to wipe that out of my brain?
translation.fr: Je vais essayer d'oublier ça, je reviens.

translation.en: Okay, so you're saying if you could have a no harm, no foul,
translation.fr:
Si on te proposait un coup d'un soir
en toute impunité

translation.en: one-off with one of your favorite Backstreet Boys, you'd say no?
translation.fr:
avec un des Backstreet Boys,
tu refuserais ?

translation.en: Backstreet Boys...
I might have mentioned
your bedroom ceiling was covered in Backstreet posters growing up.
translation.fr:
que tu avais plein de posters d'eux
dans ta chambre d'ado.

translation.en: So was yours.
Amen, sister.
-Hey, cake's in the fridge. -Okay.
All right. Well, who's next?
Yeah, well, that makes two of us, I guess.
translation.fr: Oui, tu n'es pas le seul.

translation.en: -Oh, sorry. -No.
It's fine.
It's nothing.
-Would you mind handing me that lighter? -Yes.
Who is that?
It's the chief of surgery.
Is there a problem at the hospital?
[Sean] What's the holdup in here?
Marcos will only be 30 for a year.
Why don't you pass out the plates and forks and we'll be out in just a sec?
translation.fr:
Apporte les assiettes et les couverts,
on arrive.

translation.en: Yeah, sure thing.
I didn't mean for any of this to happen.
It just happened.
What does that mean for you and Todd?
I don't know.
I keep telling myself I'm gonna end it, but...
translation.fr:
Je me répète
que je vais y mettre fin, mais...

translation.en: Look, promise me you won't say anything.
It will kill Todd to hear this secondhand, especially coming from Sean.
translation.fr:
Ça le tuerait de l'apprendre,
surtout de la bouche de Sean.

translation.en: Angela...
I'm not asking you to lie.
translation.fr: Je te demande pas de mentir.

translation.en: I just need time to figure everything out.
translation.fr:
J'ai juste besoin de temps
pour me clarifier les idées.

translation.en: Promise me, Lisa.
[woman] How are you feeling about the pitch?
Way less comfortable than I was with the fact-y figure-y version.
translation.fr:
Je suis moins à l'aise
qu'avec la version factuelle.

translation.en: But objectively, I know you pointed me in the right direction.
translation.fr:
Mais objectivement,
je sais que tu avais raison.

translation.en: Good, 'cause Gage Scott Ventures wants to meet with you tomorrow at 4:00.
translation.fr:
Tant mieux,
car Gage Scott veut te voir demain à 16 h.

translation.en: Wait, what? I thought they weren't interested.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Ils nous ont envoyés bouler.

translation.en: That was before Mr. Scott found out there was a competitive bid from his old firm.
translation.fr:
Depuis, M. Scott a découvert
que son ancienne boîte était intéressée.

translation.en: So we're peddling fake news now?
I didn't make the rules, I'm just playing the game.
translation.fr: Je me plie aux règles du jeu.

translation.en: I thought a little FOMO would go a long way with a guy like that.
translation.fr:
Je me suis dit qu'il agirait
par peur de rater sa chance.

translation.en: As it turns out, I was right.
You're an evil genius.
I know. By the way, I am sending you the link.
translation.fr: Je sais. Je t'envoie le lien, au passage.

translation.en: This guy's got some seriously stereotypical taste in women.
translation.fr: Ce mec est le machisme incarné.

translation.en: You might want to consider wearing something a little less business-y and a little more--
translation.fr:
Essaie de trouver une tenue
qui fasse moins business et plus...

translation.en: -Demeaning? -Don't be naive. We can't afford it.
translation.fr:
- Dégradante.
- Sois pas naïve. On n'a pas les moyens.

translation.en: [Sean] Dog's walked, garbage curbed, dishes done...
translation.fr:
Chien promené, poubelle sortie,
vaisselle lavée...

translation.en: Okay to come to bed or you need to keep going?
translation.fr: Je peux entrer ou tu as encore du boulot ?

translation.en: Why couldn't Sean have a twin who's into a work-obsessed Fortnite enthusiast,
translation.fr:
Sean a pas un jumeau qui voudrait
d'une geek obsédée par le boulot

translation.en: pushing the dark side of her 20s?
You'd only break his heart, Cassidy.
Not before breaking his balls.
Don't keep her up too late, Romeo.
She's got a misogynist dragon to slay.
translation.fr:
Elle a un dragon misogyne
à pourfendre, demain.

translation.en: Oh... my God.
How did you even get that on?
translation.fr: Comment as-tu réussi à enfiler ce truc ?

translation.en: You ready to bring some sexy back?
translation.fr: Besoin de rien, envie de toi.

translation.en: That's the wrong...
boy band and singer. [laughs]
translation.fr: C'est même pas un boys band.

translation.en: Come here.
You and Angela settle whatever was going on in the kitchen earlier?
translation.fr:
C'était quoi, cette histoire avec Angela,
dans la cuisine ?

translation.en: Yeah. She's just working through an issue with a co-worker
translation.fr: Elle a un problème avec un collègue,

translation.en: and needed to get some of it off her chest.
Well, she's been married to Todd since high school.
translation.fr: Elle a épousé Todd à la sortie du lycée.

translation.en: If Angela can make that work, whatever this is should be no problem.
translation.fr:
Si elle le supporte,
c'est pas ça qui lui posera problème.

translation.en: What else?
You worried about the company?
I just don't wanna let everyone down.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas décevoir tout le monde.

translation.en: Least of all, you.
Nothing you do could ever let me down.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas me décevoir.

translation.en: It's all gonna be okay.
How do you know?
Because we've got each other.
[Lisa] This little munchkin with the devilish grin
translation.fr: Ce petit lutin au sourire malicieux,

translation.en: is my sister, Emilia.
That's my brother Marcos,
and the little girl with the unfortunate pair of trifocals is yours truly.
translation.fr: et la petite Miss Binoclarde, c'est moi.

translation.en: Our mother used to say, whatever mischief one of us didn't conjure up,
translation.fr:
Ma mère disait
que si l'un d'entre nous était sage,

translation.en: the other two would.
And she was right. We were...
inseparable growing up.
The three amigos.
But obviously, it's not your real family we're talking about here, right?
translation.fr:
J'imagine que ce n'est pas
votre vraie famille, si ?

translation.en: My birth parents were killed in a house fire when I was three.
translation.fr:
Mes parents biologiques
sont morts quand j'avais trois ans.

translation.en: My nanny ended up adopting me
so I wouldn't become a ward of the state, so...
translation.fr: pour éviter que je parte en foyer.

translation.en: yeah, this is my real family.
Here's Emilia again with her hospital suitemate Tiffany.
translation.fr:
Revoilà Emilia,
avec sa coloc d'hôpital, Tiffany.

translation.en: Both were diagnosed with acute lymphocytic leukemia at age eight.
translation.fr:
À huit ans, on leur a diagnostiqué
une leucémie lymphoïde chronique.

translation.en: This is six months into treatment.
As you can see, Tiffany is thriving...
translation.fr: Comme on peut le voir, Tiffany va mieux...

translation.en: while Emilia...
is struggling.
Acute lymphocytic leukemia, is a curable disease.
translation.fr:
La leucémie lymphoïde chronique
est une maladie qui se soigne.

translation.en: The drug protocol designed to fight it produces a 90 percent survival rate.
translation.fr:
Avec le traitement,
les chances de survie sont de 90 %.

translation.en: Unfortunately, because of a genetic deviation
translation.fr:
Malheureusement,
à cause d'une particularité génétique

translation.en: in some children's immune cell checkpoints,
translation.fr:
des points de contrôle immunitaires
chez certains enfants,

translation.en: the treatment is rendered ineffectual for them.
translation.fr: le traitement ne fonctionne pas sur eux.

translation.en: ♪ Happy birthday to you... ♪
[Lisa] My little sister lost her battle six days before her ninth birthday.
translation.fr:
Ma petite sœur a perdu sa bataille
six jours avant ses neuf ans.

translation.en: If it were me who had gotten sick instead of her,
translation.fr: Si c'était moi qui avais eu le cancer,

translation.en: we'd likely both be alive, and...
translation.fr:
on serait sans doute
toutes les deux en vie, et...

translation.en: I might not have devoted my life to this cause.
translation.fr:
je n'aurais pas dédié ma vie
à cette cause.

translation.en: What we're working towards at Emigen,
is a customized map of the blockers and receptors
translation.fr:
est de créer une carte
des bloqueurs et récepteurs

translation.en: in every human being's unique immune system
translation.fr:
du système immunitaire
propre à chaque être humain

translation.en: so that drug companies can optimize medications
to work on all patients battling a life-threatening disease...
translation.fr:
de tous les patients
qui luttent contre une maladie mortelle.

translation.en: not just the lucky ones.
It's, um...
It's a very impressive presentation.
I can honestly say with...
every fiber of what some tell me is a very jaded heart...
translation.fr:
du plus profond de mon cœur,
qui paraît-il est de pierre,

translation.en: that nothing would make me happier than to invest in your company.
translation.fr:
que je serais ravi
d'investir dans votre société.

translation.en: [man] But I see a flaw in your proposal that just can't be overlooked.
translation.fr:
Mais votre proposition a un défaut
que je ne peux ignorer.

translation.en: I'm afraid big pharma would drown us in litigation
translation.fr:
Les firmes pharmaceutiques
nous étoufferaient sous les procès

translation.en: before we even got in the game.
translation.fr: avant même qu'on puisse se lancer.

translation.en: Hey, I'm sorry about your sister.
I, uh, I wish there was more I could do.
Yeah, I get that a lot.
Ma'am.
Oh, thank you.
Hey, bartender, how about something cheap and wet?
translation.fr: Barman, un truc pas cher et qui réchauffe.

translation.en: You asking or offering?
What's it look like?
Looks like you could use a bubble bath and some black coffee.
translation.fr:
Ce qu'il te faut,
c'est un bon bain et un café serré.

translation.en: As it happens...
that's our special tonight.
What's this?
I got us a room overlooking the Bay Bridge.
translation.fr: Je nous ai pris une chambre avec vue.

translation.en: We're celebrating.
How is it possible that you're not... [laughs]
translation.fr: Comment tu fais pour ne pas...

translation.en: ...reading this picture?
No investor will touch me,
my staff is about to be unemployed.
translation.fr: mes employés vont être à la rue,

translation.en: [fighting back tears] Both your life savings and the loan my parents gave me
translation.fr:
tes économies et le prêt
que m'ont fait mes parents

translation.en: has evaporated.
And we can't... [sobs]
We can't afford a room overlooking the Bay Bridge.
translation.fr:
On n'a pas les moyens
de se prendre une chambre avec vue.

translation.en: You can't solve all the world's problems. You knew that going into this.
translation.fr:
Tu ne peux pas tout régler,
tu le savais.

translation.en: That's one.
Two, the hotel room is free,
courtesy of one very cool night manager.
translation.fr: offert par un gérant super sympa.

translation.en: Three, if your company does go under, your employees knew the risks
translation.fr:
Tertio,
tes employés connaissaient les risques,

translation.en: and they're all smart enough to land on their feet.
translation.fr: ils sont assez malins pour s'en remettre.

translation.en: We're gonna pay back every cent your parents lent us.
translation.fr:
On va rembourser tes parents
jusqu'au dernier centime.

translation.en: I'll... rob a bank if I have to.
translation.fr:
Je suis prêt à braquer une banque,
s'il le faut.

translation.en: You would, wouldn't you?
Room 4703.
Give me half an hour to shut the bar down. No one's coming out in this rain anyway.
translation.fr:
Laisse-moi une demi-heure pour fermer.
Par ce temps, il n'y a personne.

translation.en: -Mm? -I'm sorry.
I love you.
Get out of here.
[sighs] Last call!
[woman] I'll have a gin martini.
One olive, very dry.
Sorry.
Didn't see you there.
translation.fr: Je ne vous avais pas vue.

translation.en: What kind of gin do you prefer?
Which do you prefer?
[chuckles] I drink whiskey.
I'd have brought it over to you.
Mm. I don't like to drink alone.
Pour yourself a whiskey.
[chuckles] Can't. Company rules.
Won't tell if you won't.
To your health.
Haven't seen you in here before. You staying at the hotel?
translation.fr:
Je ne vous ai jamais vue ici.
Vous êtes à l'hôtel ?

translation.en: No.
Well, I hope you don't live far.
It's coming down hard out there.
I have a driver. Driver has an umbrella.
translation.fr: J'ai un chauffeur. Il a un parapluie.

translation.en: He can take us wherever it is you go,
translation.fr: Il peut nous emmener où vous voulez,

translation.en: when you clock out of there.
No, thank you.
I'm really flattered, but, uh...
I'm married.
All I was offering was a ride.
translation.fr: Je proposais juste de vous déposer.

translation.en: Oh, damn. [chuckles] I'm...
I'm sorry. Please forget I said that.
translation.fr: Pardon, oubliez que j'ai dit ça.

translation.en: Sometimes when it gets late, people tend to get a little--
translation.fr:
Parfois, en fin de soirée,
certaines personnes deviennent un peu...

translation.en: Frisky.
Then what?
And then nothing.
I'm married.
Right.
To that emotional girl who just made a spectacle of herself.
translation.fr:
À la fille émotive
qui vient de se donner en spectacle.

translation.en: That girl's the most important thing in my world.
translation.fr:
C'est la personne
qui compte le plus pour moi.

translation.en: And today was a terrible day for her.
translation.fr: Et elle a passé une sale journée.

translation.en: Enjoy your drink.
Now who's been misunderstood? Let's just call it even.
translation.fr:
- À votre tour d'être mal compris.
- On est quittes.

translation.en: Let's.
But now you've got me curious.
translation.fr: Mais vous avez piqué ma curiosité.

translation.en: From where I'm sitting, she's a very lucky woman.
translation.fr:
De ce que je vois,
elle a beaucoup de chance.

translation.en: This wife of yours.
Tell me about her.
That's more like it.
You feeling any better?
Hmm... I'm not feeling any worse.
Sorry you married such a train wreck.
translation.fr: Désolée d'être une telle boule de nerfs.

translation.en: Ah, don't worry about it.
I actually met a woman after you staggered up here.
translation.fr:
J'ai rencontré une femme,
après ton départ.

translation.en: Can't say I blame you.
I hope you two will be very happy together.
translation.fr: Je vous souhaite plein de bonheur.

translation.en: [chuckles] I think she's a little more your type than mine.
translation.fr:
Je pense
qu'elle te plairait plus qu'à moi.

translation.en: [Sean] Said you'd know who she is.
translation.fr: Elle a dit que ça te parlerait.

translation.en: Anne Montgomery?
I don't-- Is this a joke?
I don't know. Maybe. Who is this lady?
translation.fr:
Je sais pas. Peut-être.
C'est qui, cette dame ?

translation.en: Only one of the most aggressive venture capitalists in town,
translation.fr:
C'est juste l'une des investisseuses
les plus agressives de San Francisco,

translation.en: and by all accounts... born of a jackal.
She definitely struck me as the kind of woman who gets what she wants.
translation.fr:
Elle avait l'air d'une femme
qui obtient ce qu'elle veut.

translation.en: And what she wants is to meet my wife.
translation.fr: Et ce qu'elle veut, c'est te rencontrer.

translation.en: Wait.
You... told her about me?
translation.fr: Tu lui as parlé de moi ?

translation.en: Just the basics.
She's hosting some big investor thing and wants to hear more about Emigen.
translation.fr:
Elle donne un gala d'investisseurs,
Emigen l'intéresse.

translation.en: Think you can...
squeeze the jackal onto your calendar?
translation.fr: caser la harpie dans ton agenda ?

translation.en: I can squeeze a lot more than that.
Morning, Cassidy. You're in early.
-Late, actually. -You were in all night?
translation.fr: Tard, à vrai dire. T'es restée toute la nuit ?

translation.en: What in the world were you doing?
Making sure we didn't overlook any potential Hail Marys.
translation.fr:
Je passais au crible les solutions
qui nous restaient.

translation.en: That, and a fistful of Adderall.
Unfortunately, you hired a very thorough CFO.
translation.fr:
Pour ton malheur,
ta directrice financière est maniaque.

translation.en: I think we're out of options, Lis.
translation.fr: On est au pied du mur.

translation.en: Think again.
What if I told you that we were gonna make a run
translation.fr: Et si je te disais qu'on allait démarcher

translation.en: at Anne Montgomery?
Well, I'd ask you if you hit your head.
translation.fr: Je m'inquiéterais pour ta santé mentale.

translation.en: You don't just demand a meeting with Anne Montgomery. She'd have you executed.
translation.fr:
On n'exige pas de la voir.
Elle en a exécuté pour moins que ça.

translation.en: I didn't have to. She offered.
translation.fr: J'ai rien eu à faire. Elle me l'a proposé.

translation.en: She... offered?
Do you know how hard I worked to get us in the door with that woman?
translation.fr:
C'est impossible
d'obtenir un rendez-vous avec elle.

translation.en: -What did you do? -I promise I'll tell you the story later.
translation.fr:
- Comment t'as fait ?
- Je te raconterai.

translation.en: Now I have to cram my brain full of everything I need to win her over.
translation.fr:
Je dois potasser
tout ce qu'il me faut pour la séduire.

translation.en: Start and stop right there.
That has been out for less than a week,
translation.fr:
Publié il y a une semaine.
Je l'ai déjà lu quatre fois.

translation.en: and I've already read through it, like, four times.
translation.fr:
Publié il y a une semaine.
Je l'ai déjà lu quatre fois. À TOUT PRIX

translation.en: She is my spirit animal.
Really?
Everything I've read about her makes her seem kind of... horrible.
translation.fr: De ce que j'ai lu, elle a l'air horrible.

translation.en: The world's a horrible place,
but Anne Montgomery wakes up every morning and she eats it for breakfast.
translation.fr:
mais Anne Montgomery
n'en fait qu'une bouchée.

translation.en: Mrs. McIntire?
It's the EMTs who brought your son to the hospital yesterday.
translation.fr:
C'est les ambulanciers
qui ont secouru votre fils.

translation.en: Got him a get well present.
translation.fr: On lui a apporté un cadeau.

translation.en: I'll just leave it here by the door, okay?
translation.fr: Je le laisse devant la porte.

translation.en: Do you smell smoke?
Mrs. McIntire!
Unit 19 shelter fire, 38 East 19th Street!
translation.fr:
Unité 19, on a un incendie
au 38, 19th Street !

translation.en: -[fire alarm blaring] -Everybody out, now!
Mrs. McIntire!
[child] Help!
Help us!
Help!
Help! Help!
[Sean] Come on! We gotta get you out of here!
Mom and kids checked out okay. Social services has them.
translation.fr:
La mère et le gosse n'ont rien.
Les services sociaux s'occupent d'eux.

translation.en: Cops found the father holed up in the basement.
translation.fr: Le père se planquait au sous-sol.

translation.en: Got a list of convictions a mile long.
translation.fr: Un casier judiciaire long comme le bras.

translation.en: [Todd] Assault, possession, trafficking, aggravated child abuse.
translation.fr:
Agression, trafic de drogue,
maltraitance sur enfant.

translation.en: No way this guy should've ever made parole.
translation.fr: Il aurait jamais dû sortir de taule.

translation.en: Hey, whatever's going through your head, it's not worth it.
translation.fr: Il en vaut pas la peine.

translation.en: Sean, I'm serious, man. Don't do this. Hey.
Sean, what the fuck, man?
You the paramedics who rescued that family?
translation.fr: C'est vous qui les avez sauvés ?

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -[man] You two boys are real heroes.
translation.fr:
- Oui.
- Vous êtes de vrais héros.

translation.en: Whole place could've gone up.
Heard one of you applied for the academy. We both did.
translation.fr:
- Paraît que vous voulez être pompiers ?
- Oui.

translation.en: -What are your names? -Todd Archer, Sean Donovan.
translation.fr: Comment vous vous appelez ? Todd Archer, Sean Donovan.

translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Sean and Lisa Donovan to see Miss Montgomery.
translation.fr:
M. et Mme Sean et Lisa Donovan,
pour Mme Montgomery.

translation.en: Welcome. I'll let her know you've arrived.
translation.fr:
Bienvenue.
Je vais la prévenir de votre arrivée.

translation.en: [woman] Oh, thank you very much.
[man] Excuse me.
You know that guy?
[Lisa] Not exactly.
[Foster] If you wouldn't mind stepping into the library, Miss Montgomery will be with you shortly.
translation.fr:
Si vous voulez bien me suivre,
Mme Montgomery va vous rejoindre.

translation.en: Hello, Sean. Don't get up.
I can't spare much time.
You must be Lisa.
Yes. Thank you for the meeting, Miss Montgomery.
I'll get right to it.
No. No need for that.
I've done my homework. You wouldn't be here otherwise.
translation.fr:
J'ai fait mes recherches,
ou vous ne seriez pas là.

translation.en: -Thank you. -Oh, don't thank me yet.
translation.fr:
- Merci.
- Ne me remerciez pas encore.

translation.en: Many of my competitors, like that nauseatingly arrogant Gage Scott,
translation.fr:
Mes concurrents, comme Gage Scott,
cet écœurant ramassis d'arrogance

translation.en: whom your husband told me passed on your pitch, make decisions out of fear.
translation.fr:
qui a refusé votre offre,
prennent leurs décisions par peur.

translation.en: I operate on potential.
Which is something I believe your company has in spades.
translation.fr: Et je pense que votre société en regorge.

translation.en: It's you I'm not sold on.
translation.fr: C'est sur vous que j'ai des doutes.

translation.en: How can I convince you otherwise?
Have you read my latest book?
-Studied it. -Oh, is that so?
So tell me...
are you two planning on having children?
-Yeah. -Some day.
Right now, I am one hundred percent focused on Emigen.
translation.fr:
Pour l'instant,
je me concentre sur Emigen à 100 %.

translation.en: One hundred percent?
I know you consider the correlation between personal sacrifice and elite success
translation.fr:
Je sais que le lien
entre sacrifice personnel et succès

translation.en: to be one of the cornerstones of your business doctrine.
translation.fr: est la pierre angulaire de votre doctrine.

translation.en: Not a cornerstone. The foundation.
translation.fr: Pas la pierre angulaire. La fondation.

translation.en: What I mean to say is I am fully prepared for this opportunity.
translation.fr:
Je veux dire
que je suis prête à saisir cette chance.

translation.en: Nothing is more important to me.
Not even your marriage?
What kind of question is that?
It's a question for your wife.
I assume Sean told you how we met?
translation.fr: Sean a dû vous raconter notre rencontre.

translation.en: He said you struck up a conversation at the hotel bar.
translation.fr:
Il a dit
que vous aviez discuté au bar de l'hôtel.

translation.en: Did he also mention that he thought I was coming on to him?
translation.fr:
Il a mentionné
qu'il croyait que je le draguais ?

translation.en: Smart women have always found Sean attractive.
I consider it a compliment.
So what you're saying is that if I had been trying to seduce your husband...
translation.fr:
Donc, même si j'avais vraiment voulu
séduire votre mari,

translation.en: you'd still be here?
I'm saying Sean would never cheat on me.
I trust him.
Trust is the most dangerous thing you can give away, Lisa.
translation.fr:
Rien n'est plus dangereux
que la confiance.

translation.en: But for the sake of argument,
let's take cheating out of the equation.
Say you were fully complicit in our affair.
Would that be an acceptable condition of a firm offer to finance your company?
translation.fr:
Accepteriez-vous cette condition
pour que je finance votre société ?

translation.en: You're asking if I would be willing to trade my husband for my company?
translation.fr: Échanger mon mari contre ma société ?

translation.en: That would not be an acceptable condition...
Anne.
Let's get out of here.
Lisa, wait, it's just a game.
Like Lionel and his bowl of questions. Only not nearly as original.
translation.fr:
- Comme Lionel et ses questions.
- En moins original.

translation.en: This whole idea was ripped right out of a bad '90s movie.
translation.fr: Cette idée vient d'un navet des années 90.

translation.en: She wants to have sex with you, Sean.
-Plain and simple. -Why?
Because Anne is legendary
translation.fr: Car Anne a la réputation légendaire

translation.en: for exploiting people's weaknesses to her advantage.
translation.fr: de tirer profit des faiblesses des gens.

translation.en: She sees our marriage as my weakness.
translation.fr: Pour elle, tu es mon point faible.

translation.en: Did I get that right?
All but the movie reference.
I thought that film was quite decent.
By my calculation, it would take roughly 80 million
translation.fr:
D'après mes calculs,
il faudrait environ 80 millions

translation.en: to optimize your discovery, assuming proof of concept.
translation.fr:
pour optimiser votre découverte,
plus l'étude de faisabilité.

translation.en: That's not the kind of investment I'm comfortable making
translation.fr:
Je ne prends pas un tel investissement
à la légère.

translation.en: without a guarantee that the woman in charge
translation.fr:
Je dois être sûre
que la personne à qui j'ai affaire

translation.en: is willing to put whatever is necessary on the line to ensure its success.
translation.fr:
est prête à tout
pour garantir le succès de sa société.

translation.en: In this case...
a night alone with her husband.
My offer expires in 24 hours.
[Anne] What's your name?
-Valerie Simmons. -[Anne] Valerie...
I see you're wearing the same mint Chanel
translation.fr: Je vois que vous portez le même tailleur

translation.en: they put me in for my Forbes spread back in...
translation.fr:
que celui que je portais
pour mon article dans Forbes en...

translation.en: What was it? 2015?
Yes, Miss Montgomery.
Stand up, sweetie.
My lawyers are currently waging a libel suit
against that dated rag's former editor,
translation.fr:
l'ancien éditeur
de ce torchon poussiéreux,

translation.en: and had you done the slightest bit of research,
translation.fr: et si vous aviez fait vos recherches,

translation.en: you might have reconsidered wearing that embarrassing cry for attention,
translation.fr:
vous auriez évité
de porter une tenue si outrageuse,

translation.en: as all you've succeeded in doing today is exposing your own inadequacy.
translation.fr:
car tout ce que vous avez réussi à faire,
c'est illustrer votre déficience.

translation.en: It's incredible.
Eighteen million views in three days.
translation.fr: Dix-huit millions de vues en trois jours.

translation.en: Don't do this to yourself.
What kind of person gets off on making others feel stupid
translation.fr:
Qui prend plaisir
à traiter les autres comme des abrutis

translation.en: and powerless and disposable?
A shitty one.
It's weird not having Castro here.
translation.fr: C'est bizarre de dormir sans Castro.

translation.en: I'll meet up with Marcos between shifts and pick him up tomorrow.
translation.fr: J'irai le chercher chez Marcos demain.

translation.en: No, I'll do it.
Tell me again how everything's gonna be okay.
Everything is going to be okay.
[Lisa] Castro! Come here, Castro!
Oh, hi. How much I missed you!
You and Sean live it up like rock stars the other night?
translation.fr:
Vous avez fait la fête,
avec Sean, l'autre soir ?

translation.en: [Lisa] You know it.
After a few drinks, we got to talking about Lionel's challenge
translation.fr:
Après quelques verres,
on a reparlé du défi de Lionel

translation.en: and decided to order half a dozen couples up to the room.
translation.fr: et on a fait monter six autres couples.

translation.en: Only half a dozen?
-Prude. -Oh, yeah?
I remember when the most risqué thing in your closet was a pinstriped Oxford.
translation.fr: À une époque, ta tenue la plus osée était une chemise à rayures.

translation.en: -[laughs] -Now I'm guessing...
translation.fr: était une chemise à rayures. Aujourd'hui, laisse-moi deviner.

translation.en: pleated, leather chaps.
Don't! Don't!
Oh. The things we do for our first boyfriends.
translation.fr: Le premier copain, ça rend fou.

translation.en: First and last, hopefully.
I want with Lionel what you have with Sean.
translation.fr: Je veux la même chose que toi et Sean.

translation.en: What's that, exactly?
Total trust.
And you two are invincible no matter what the universe throws at you.
translation.fr:
L'univers a beau s'acharner sur vous,
vous êtes invincibles.

translation.en: Yeah, well, the universe has been having a field day with us recently.
translation.fr:
L'univers s'en donne à cœur joie,
ces derniers temps.

translation.en: And that brings me to my not-so-elegant segue.
translation.fr:
Et j'ai peur
de devoir en rajouter une couche.

translation.en: [sighs] Papa would kill me if he knew I was telling you this, but...
translation.fr:
Papa me tuerait
s'il savait que je te dis ça.

translation.en: La Cuchara's been going through a rough patch.
translation.fr: La Cuchara a des problèmes d'argent.

translation.en: He asked if I knew when you might be able to pay the loan back.
translation.fr:
Il m'a demandé
quand tu pensais les rembourser.

translation.en: It's gonna be a while.
How bad is it?
Turns out the money they gave you didn't come from savings.
translation.fr:
L'argent qu'ils t'ont prêté,
c'était pas des économies.

translation.en: They got a second mortgage on the restaurant.
translation.fr:
Ils ont pris une deuxième hypothèque
sur le restaurant.

translation.en: If they default...
they could lose everything.
All my cases have been pro bono this year, so I'm pretty tapped.
translation.fr:
J'ai travaillé bénévolement cette année,
j'ai pas un rond.

translation.en: I'd ask Lionel, but he's been--
No, it's my responsibility, Marcos.
I will take care of it.
[Sean's voice] I'll never forget the day I met my wife.
translation.fr:
Je me rappelle le jour
où j'ai rencontré Lisa.

translation.en: For those of you who don't know the story, there's this spot in Corona Heights Park
translation.fr:
Si vous ne connaissez pas l'histoire,
il y a un coin dans le parc

translation.en: where my brother and I used to play catch.
translation.fr: où on jouait à la balle avec mon frère.

translation.en: After he died, it kind of became my go-to place for heavy thinking.
translation.fr: À sa mort, c'est devenu mon coin préféré pour réfléchir.

translation.en: Which I was doing a lot of last year,
translation.fr: Ce qui m'arrivait souvent l'an dernier,

translation.en: especially on the day the Giants told me they weren't picking up my contract.
translation.fr:
quand j'ai su que les Giants
ne renouvelaient pas mon contrat.

translation.en: Giants suck!
No, no. I had a terrible season, Archer, you know it, I know it,
translation.fr:
Non, j'avais mal joué, cette saison.
Tu le sais, je le sais,

translation.en: -the whole city knew it. -Story's got a happy ending, though.
translation.fr: toute la ville le sait. Ça finit bien.

translation.en: I'm getting to that, if you'll let me.
So when I get to the park that day...
translation.fr: Ce jour-là, en arrivant au parc...

translation.en: I find this...
incredibly beautiful...
really inconvenient grad student sitting on my bench,
translation.fr:
et très gênante,
car elle était sur mon banc,

translation.en: working on her biology thesis.
translation.fr: à écrire sa thèse de biologie.

translation.en: And while there's this massive deadline hanging over her head,
translation.fr: Et malgré l'urgence de son travail,

translation.en: she took pity on a total stranger...
translation.fr: elle a pris pitié d'un inconnu

translation.en: and let me share the bench with her.
translation.fr: et a daigné partager le banc.

translation.en: It wasn't until after the sun went down...
translation.fr: Ce n'est que la nuit tombée

translation.en: that I realized what...
what started out as one of the toughest days of my life...
translation.fr: que l'un des pires jours de ma vie...

translation.en: had turned into one of the best.
If you hadn't let me sit down with you that day, I... I have
translation.fr:
Si tu ne m'avais pas laissé
m'asseoir à côté de toi,

translation.en: no idea what my future might have turned into.
translation.fr: qui sait ce que je serais devenu ?

translation.en: [Lisa] Excuse me, sir.
Is this seat taken?
Want me to go first?
Nah, I got the cleat.
Todd and I found out we made it into the fire academy today.
translation.fr:
Avec Todd, on a été admis
à la formation de pompier.

translation.en: Oh, my God. That's--
Intense timing.
I know.
I'm so proud of you.
Thanks, but both our backs are seriously against the wall right now.
translation.fr: Merci, mais on galère déjà financièrement.

translation.en: We can't afford a downshift in income.
translation.fr: On a besoin de mon salaire.

translation.en: Even a temporary one, so I...
I came here to think about our options.
Everything that's gotten us to this point.
translation.fr: Comment on en est arrivés là.

translation.en: And?
And the first thing that popped into my head
translation.fr: Le premier truc qui m'est venu,

translation.en: was how crazy it is we ever met in the first place.
translation.fr:
c'est la chance qu'on a eue
de se rencontrer.

translation.en: What if you decided to study at the library that day instead of here?
translation.fr:
Et si tu étais allée étudier
à la bibliothèque ?

translation.en: Or if Todd hadn't gotten called into work. I...
translation.fr: Si Todd n'avait pas dû bosser.

translation.en: might have been drowning myself at some bar with him
translation.fr: J'aurais peut-être picolé au bar avec lui

translation.en: instead of meeting my future wife.
translation.fr: au lieu de rencontrer ma femme.

translation.en: It's a real rabbit hole thinking about the things that had to go exactly right,
translation.fr:
C'est vertigineux,
toutes les choses qui ont dû arriver,

translation.en: stuff that had to go so fucking terrible to lead us both to this bench
translation.fr:
en bien comme en mal,
pour qu'on se retrouve tous deux ici

translation.en: at that moment, on that day.
So I've been sitting here going over what you said...
translation.fr: Je réfléchissais à ce que tu disais.

translation.en: about...
feeling disposable and--
Powerless.
So now I guess I'm wondering how you'd feel
translation.fr: Je me demandais si tu accepterais

translation.en: if we made a decision to take some power back.
translation.fr:
de prendre une décision
pour récupérer l'avantage.

translation.en: I've been wondering the same thing.
We've both come through... [sighs]
...a hell of a lot in our lives.
translation.fr: on n'a pas eu la vie facile.

translation.en: But at least we know...
we can trust each other to handle anything.
translation.fr: qu'on peut compter l'un sur l'autre.

translation.en: And...
I don't think there's any way someone as patently pathetic as Anne Montgomery
translation.fr:
je doute qu'une femme aussi pathétique
qu'Anne Montgomery

translation.en: has what it takes to get in between that, not in one night.
translation.fr:
arrive à briser cette confiance
en une nuit.

translation.en: Not in one lifetime.
Well...
we still have a few hours to tell this bitch
translation.fr:
Il nous reste quelques heures
pour envoyer cette connasse

translation.en: to go to hell.
But you and me...
we're a lot stronger than she thinks we are.
translation.fr: on est plus forts qu'elle ne le pense.

translation.en: So are we saying we're good to do this?
I am if you are.
Then let's do it.
Hello, Lisa.
[Lisa] We accept your offer.
I'll send a car.
Why don't you pour yourself a whiskey.
I don't think so.
There's no need to be nervous.
No one said we were.
Sean, come here for a sec.
She wrote a clause into the contract excluding you from sharing any details
translation.fr:
Il y a une clause dans le contrat
qui t'interdit de révéler les détails

translation.en: about what happens after I leave here tonight.
translation.fr: de ce qui se passe après mon départ.

translation.en: [whispers] If you say anything to me or anyone else, we lose the company.
translation.fr:
Si tu en parles à qui que ce soit,
on perd la société.

translation.en: Why would either of us ever want to talk about this again?
The quicker we put tonight behind us, the better.
translation.fr: Mieux vaut en finir au plus vite.

translation.en: We just have to trust each other.
[scoffs] It's not you I don't trust.
translation.fr: C'est pas de toi que je me méfie.

translation.en: I assume you saw the space for your company's routing numbers.
translation.fr:
J'ai laissé
les coordonnées bancaires en blanc.

translation.en: That's why we're here, isn't it?
translation.fr: C'est pour ça qu'on est là, non ?

translation.en: Well, it's certainly why you're here.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que tu es là.

translation.en: You'll receive a good faith wire transfer
translation.fr: Je ferai un virement de bonne foi

translation.en: totaling a quarter of my investment, tomorrow morning.
translation.fr:
d'un quart de mon investissement
demain matin.

translation.en: Twenty million dollars.
Well...
it appears there's only one thing left to do.
translation.fr: Il ne nous reste qu'une chose à faire.

translation.en: Well, two.
Foster, we'll need a witness.
translation.fr: Foster, il nous faut un témoin.

translation.en: Sean, may I have your phone, please?
Why do you need his phone?
If you're having second thoughts, now is the time to share them.
translation.fr:
Si tu as des doutes,
c'est le moment de lui en faire part.

translation.en: Not some desperate text in the middle of the night.
translation.fr:
Je ne veux pas
de texto désespéré en pleine nuit.

translation.en: Thank you.
I'll let you say goodbye.
translation.fr: Je vous laisse vous dire au revoir.

translation.en: I love you.
[whispers] I love you.
Oh, keep the pen. It's one of many.
translation.fr: Garde le stylo, j'en ai plein.

translation.en: Come sit with me by the fire.
If it's okay, can we not talk anymore and just...
translation.fr: J'aime autant zapper le blabla et...

translation.en: do what you brought me here to do?
Well, aren't you just so sweet and innocent?
translation.fr: Ta naïveté et ton innocence me touchent.

translation.en: I haven't even begun to tell you what it is you're doing here.
translation.fr:
Je ne t'ai même pas dit
ce que j'attendais de toi.

translation.en: In science, one of the first things you learn
translation.fr:
En science,
l'un des premiers trucs qu'on apprend,

translation.en: is that you can only trust the things that you can prove.
translation.fr:
c'est de ne croire
qu'en ce qu'on peut prouver.

translation.en: But if any of you guys ask me to offer...
translation.fr: Mais si vous me demandiez de vous montrer

translation.en: physical proof of...
just how much Sean means to me...
translation.fr: de ce que Sean représente pour moi,

translation.en: there's no empirical way that I could.
[Lisa] And this is what's called...
the scientific paradox.
-Oh, my God. I am so bad at this. -[crowd laughs]
translation.fr: Mon Dieu, je suis nulle pour les discours.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
What I'm...
trying to say is...
translation.fr:
Ce que j'essaie de dire... Les parties n'auront
aucune communication...

translation.en: -Falling in love with Sean has taught me-- -[sighs]
translation.fr: Tomber amoureuse de Sean m'a appris

translation.en: ...it's just as important to trust the things that you can feel...
translation.fr:
qu'il est aussi important
de croire en ce qu'on ressent

translation.en: as the things you can prove.
Fuck!
Hello? Can anybody hear me?
-[elevator bell dings] -Fuck.
Sean!
Sean! Call it off!
They're gone.
Where did you take them?
When I returned, the residence was empty.
translation.fr: À mon retour, il n'y avait personne.

translation.en: Mrs. Montgomery? Are you okay?
Everything's all right, Gabriel. The young lady's under contract.
translation.fr:
Tout va bien, Gabriel.
Cette jeune femme est une associée.

translation.en: Keycard, please.
What does she get out of it?
Treating people like toys?
translation.fr: De nous traiter comme ses jouets.

translation.en: What motivates Miss Montgomery is far more nuanced than I could say.
translation.fr:
Les motivations de Mme Montgomery
sont bien trop subtiles pour moi.

translation.en: But I have never seen her waste a minute of time on anything...
translation.fr:
Mais je ne l'ai jamais vue
perdre son temps avec quelque chose

translation.en: or anyone...
so insignificant as a toy.
Hello, Cassidy?
[Cassidy] Where have you been? Did you get any of my messages?
translation.fr: T'étais où ? T'as eu mes messages ?

translation.en: [sighs] No, I...
What's happened?
Anne Montgomery just saved our ass to the tune of $20 million.
translation.fr:
Anne Montgomery nous a sauvé la mise
avec un virement de 20 millions.

translation.en: That's what happened.
Whatever the hell you did to win her over, it could not have paid off any huger.
translation.fr:
Je ne sais pas comment tu l'as séduite,
mais ça valait le coup.

translation.en: I'll call you back.
Are you okay?
Hey, buddy.
Your hand... What did she...?
We're not allowed to talk about it.
translation.fr: On n'a pas le droit d'en parler.

translation.en: You can... if you want to.
translation.fr: Tu peux en parler, si tu veux.

translation.en: [Lisa] The contract isn't triggered until I start spending her money.
translation.fr:
Le contrat ne prend effet
que si je dépense son argent.

translation.en: Then start spending it.
Nothing I say now will undo what we did. Might as well get what you wanted.
translation.fr:
Rien n'effacera ce qu'on a fait.
Autant en tirer ce que tu voulais.

translation.en: What I wanted?
Sean, I went back for you. I tried to stop it.
translation.fr:
Sean, je suis revenue te chercher.
J'ai voulu t'arrêter.

translation.en: Say something.
I need to take a shower.
Your breakfast meeting has arrived.
I'll tell 'em you're indisposed.
translation.fr: Je lui dis que vous êtes indisposée.

translation.en: You think I'm a terrible person, don't you?
I think when you've suffered terrible things...
translation.fr: Je pense que subir des atrocités

translation.en: you become capable of terrible things.
translation.fr: rend capable de commettre des atrocités.

translation.en: Have the staff clear my calendar. I won't be taking any meetings this morning.
translation.fr:
Dégagez mon emploi du temps.
Je ne verrai personne ce matin.

translation.en: ♪ Give me more ♪
translation.fr: LE JEUNE PHÉNOMÈNE SE BRÛLE LES AILES

translation.en: ♪ Underneath and inside ♪
translation.fr:
ENRAGÉ !
DONOVAN SUR LA TOUCHE APRÈS UNE CRISE

translation.en: ♪ Just to come around ♪ ♪ More, give me more, give me more ♪
translation.fr: LAISSÉ POUR MORT DERRIÈRE UN BAR
